title: Gamestop Mechs Vs. Minions
body:
Does anyone know if Mechs Vs. Minions will be available at Gamestop
It looks really fun!

replies.body:
*Lew* is correct. You can find more about Mechs VS Minions on its [official page.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/mechs-vs-minions)

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Thanks, I assumed it might be in stores since the Vinyl Pop figures where, even though its not I still look forward to buying it!
The board game is exclusive to the Riot Games merch store so it won't be available at Gamestop.
